name: Core (itch) (Miles Carr)
description:
CORE - An FPS, physics based puzzle game developed in UE5.

Traverse through 4 different and unique test chambers that require the player to use physics based items in order to reach their goal.

Credits

- Adam Jones - Technical Designer

- Amber Rothwell - Environment, Texture and 3D artist

- Daniel Jolly - 3D modeller

- Miles Carr & Filip Krawczyk - Level Designer
